channel.title: Cri on iAtlas
channel.description: Recent content in Cri on iAtlas

item.title: Portal launched in beta
item.description: Introduction to iAtlas The iAtlas portal serves as an interactive companion to the recently-to-be published paper “The Immune Landscape of Cancer”. Basic Use Currently, the portal is built using R/Shiny, which gives us a way to make quick prototypes and integrate feedback from users. Eventually, we will be moving towards a more robust javascript based solution.
